mapper.insert: /* 공지사항 등록 */ INSERT INTO notice_center (notice_num ,e_code ,notice_title ,notice_content ,notice_img ,notice_date ,notice_view) VALUES (#{noticeNumCode}, #{employeeCode} , #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent}, #{noticeImg}, CURDATE(), 0)
mapper.select: /* 공지사항 게시물 조회 */ SELECT notice_num ,notice_title ,notice_content ,notice_date FROM notice_center WHERE notice_num = #{noticeNumCode};
/* 공지사항 목록 조회 */ SELECT notice_num ,e_code ,notice_title ,notice_content ,notice_img ,notice_date ,notice_view FROM notice_center order by notice_num DESC
